title: Font Identity Help
content:
Hi everyone, I am hoping someone can help me to identify the font used in my iPhone app logo. I had my hard drive crash a couple of weeks ago and lost everything. I had a backup of the PSD I used to create the logo, but the font was missing and for the life of my cannot figure out which one was used. I tried looking in Photoshop for the missing font, but it doesn't seem to show. Can anyone point me in the right direction?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130322013129im_/http:/typophile.com/files/icon%20square%20big_5433.png)
author: dwinegar

comments.content:
Hello  
Please check:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Spire-Regular-grouptype.font?text=aLc](http://web.archive.org/web/20130322013129/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Spire-Regular-grouptype.font?text=aLc "http://www.whatfontis.com/Spire-Regular-grouptype.font?text=aLc")  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130322013129/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
That's it! Great...thank you...you saved me a lot of headaches. Will save WF for future reference.
